With all that has been going on over the past few months, we wanted to give you a quick update on our potential new school.

Our design committee met last week Thursday to review some preliminary site and concept designs. Our initial plan was to get a bond measure on the upcoming ballot in November. The deadline to put the measure on the ballot was last Thursday. We decided not to submit anything at this time until we had a better understanding of maximum cost and a design of a building that would fit our needs.

The design committee has stated from the beginning that we want to make sure that we keep our stakeholders well informed before we take anything to a vote. So, we will be keeping you posted as this process progresses.
